response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds significant value and could greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $15,000. This price reflects not only the quality and features of the product but also the opportunity to secure it at a competitive advantage. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 15000}
